abstractContent.text: In this paper 1 I describe the use of Danish pronouns and deictics in dialogues.

Then I present an adaptation to Danish of Eckert and Strube's algorithm for resolving anaphora referring to individual NPs and abstract objects in En-glish dialogues (Eckert and Strube, 1999b; Eckert and Strube, 1999a).
The adapted algorithm is tested on four Danish dialogues from two dialogue collections and the results obtained are evaluated.
